This paragraph is a bit confusing and seems to conflate two ideas.
You can restore an entire data stream. This also restores the stream's backing indices.
Separately, you can also restore individual backing indices without restoring an entire data stream. However, these restored backing indices are treated as regular indices. They aren't auto-added to any existing data stream.
